line.text: Alack what poverty my muse brings forth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That having such a scope to show her pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The argument all bare is of more worth

line.text: Than when it hath my added praise beside

line.text: O blame me not if I no more can write
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Look in your glass and there appears a face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That over-goes my blunt invention quite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Dulling my lines and doing me disgrace
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Were it not sinful then striving to mend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To mar the subject that before was well
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For to no other pass my verses tend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than of your graces and your gifts to tell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And more much more than in my verse can sit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
